description: Try our easy to follow Italian Tomato & Kale Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Italian Tomato & Kale Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Campbells Real Stock Vegetable Salt reduced
2 Macro Organic Tomatoes Diced No Added Salt
450 g Macro Organic Chopped Kale Portions

recipeInstructions.text: Stir kale through soup and season. Ladle mixture into bowls and top with a dollop of ricotta. Scatter over zest and serve with sourdough.
Stir kale through soup and season. Ladle mixture into bowls and top with a dollop of ricotta. Scatter over zest and serve with sourdough.
